subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Portland center Greg Oden, the top pick in last month’s N.B.A. draft, needs to have his tonsils removed and is expected to miss the rest of the Trail Blazers’ summer-league games.
snippet: Portland center Greg Oden, the top pick in last month’s N.B.A. draft, needs to have his tonsils removed and is expected to miss the rest of the Trail Blazers’ summer-league games.
